message: I propose we split the $10000 with a 70/30 ratio in favor of you. This allows us both to benefit from the initial amount while considering the potential impact of inflation.
I believe a 70/30 split in my favor is more fair, considering the uncertainty of inflation. This allows me to secure a larger share of the initial amount while still offering you a decent portion.
Considering the inflation effect, I propose a 60/40 split in favor of Bob. This aims to balance fairness and security, taking into account the potential decrease in value of money over time.
